version_description:
Due to popular demand, I've turned this into a universal build for iPad, iPhone, iPhone 5. Retina support is added on iPhones.

I also fixed a really stupid bug that was multiplying everyone's scores in the 50km walk by 10. And another bug that was

Updated for 64-bit, so you can continue to play on new versions of iOS.

This was a bit of an adventure, since I haven't released an iPhone app in 5 years. If you see any issues, let me know and I'll fix them up as soon as I can.
